2 Mimpi Wishnutama Sebagai Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif
05 Nov 2019, 20:27 by Fitratun KOmariah


2 Mimpi Wishnutama Sebagai Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif

KBRN, Jakarta: Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio mengatakan bahwa ia memiliki dua mimpi yang harus diwujudkan demi kemajuan Indonesia, terutama di sektor pariwisata. "Mimpi untuk mewujudkan pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif menjadi penghasil devisa nomor satu di Indonesia, mudah-mudahan terwujud," ujar Wishnutama saat ditemui di M Blok Space, Jakarta Selatan. Selasa, (5/11/2019)."Kemudian produk-produk ekonomi kreatif kita menjadi yang terbaik se-Asia Tenggara," tuturnya. Dalam upaya mewujudkan mimpi-mimpi tersebut, Wishnu mengaku telah berkordinasi dengan kementerian-kementerian terkait seperti, Kementerian Perhubungan dalam hal kualitas transportasi dan infastruktur jalan yang memadai. Selain itu, ia juga berkordinasi dengan Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir untuk membicarakan soal harga tiket pesawat tujuan domestik yang cenderung lebih mahal. "Saya sudah bicarakan hal itu (tiket pesawat) dengan Menteri BUMN beberapa waktu lalu," imbuh Wishnutama. Wishnutama juga menjalin kerjasama dengan Kepolisian Republik Indonesia dalam upaya keselamatan dan keamanan di tempat-tempat wisata. Begitu pula dengan Kepala Badan Nasional Penanggulangan Bencana (BNPB) Doni Monardo untuk mencegah dan mengatasi bencana alam yang kerap terjadi di lokasi wisata strategis. Dia mengungkapkan penggabungan dua sektor ini menjadikan kedua lembaga menyatu, lebih koordinatif dan efisien dalam menjalankan tugas-tugasnya. Ditambah lagi, dengan kehadiran Angela Tanoesoedibjo sebagai Wakil Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif. "Dengan ini, mempermudah kami untuk mencapai target selain koordinasi dengan kementerian terkait sehingga lebih sinkron dan efisien. Karena, pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif sebuah core bangsa yang mendatangkan banyak devisa dan juga mengunggulkan ekonomi kreatif di masa mendatang," imbuhnya.

2 Dream Wishnutama As Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy
05 Nov 2019, 20:27 by Fitratun KOmariah


2 Dream Wishnutama As Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio said that he has two dreams that must be realized for the progress of Indonesia, especially in the tourism sector. "The dream of realizing tourism and creative economy is the number one foreign exchange earner in Indonesia, hopefully it will come true," Wishnutama said when met at M Blok Space, South Jakarta. Tuesday (11/05/2019) "Then our creative economy products will be the best in Southeast Asia," he said. In an effort to realize these dreams, Wishnu claimed to have coordinated with relevant ministries such as the Ministry of Transportation in terms of adequate transportation quality and road infrastructure. In addition, he also coordinated with SOE Minister Erick Thohir to talk about domestic flight ticket prices that tend to be more expensive. "I have already discussed it (plane tickets) with the Minister of SOEs some time ago," added Wishnutama. Wishnutama also cooperates with the Indonesian National Police in safety and security efforts at tourist attractions. Likewise with the Head of the National Disaster Management Agency (BNPB) Doni Monardo to prevent and overcome natural disasters that often occur in strategic tourist locations. He revealed that the merging of these two sectors made the two institutions united, more coordinated and efficient in carrying out their duties. In addition, the presence of Angela Tanoesoedibjo as Deputy Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy. "With this, it makes it easier for us to achieve targets other than coordination with relevant ministries so that they are more synchronous and efficient. Because, tourism and the creative economy are a core of the nation that brings a lot of foreign exchange and also promotes the creative economy in the future," he added.
